alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 18 at 7:42PM EDT until March 18 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend Florida... Bay County in the panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the panhandle of Florida... * Until 945 PM CDT /1045 PM EDT/. * At 642 PM CDT /742 PM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Bristol, Altha, Ebro, Youngstown, Saunders, Nixon, Fountain, Cairo, Singer Road, Broad Branch and Bennett. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
